description.en: Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Demon-kun, is much better than her...

altTitles.en: Girl's way of running the planet

description.en:
Ayumi Miyamura came to Mt. Mitake in Okutama, Tokyo to lose weight.
On her way to the trailhead, she encounters a strange runner who dashed past her and entered the mountain from a back road. Unbeknownst to her, this was her first encounter with a map and compass, and the start of her quest to participate in an "adventure race."

This is the start of a next-generation outdoor manga about enjoying nature with all one's being.
description.id: Ayumi Miyamura, yang mendaki gunung untuk berdiet, bertemu dengan seorang gadis misterius yang mendaki gunung tanpa jalan daki.

description.en:
As children, Billy promised Kirika, an oni girl, that he would always protect her even after they got older. Ten years have passed since that promise and it looks like the roles have reversed?
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.
description.pt-br: Quando crianças, Billy prometeu a Kirika, uma garota oni, que iria sempre a proteger mesmo depois de mais velhos. Dez anos já se passaram desde essa promessa e parece que os papeis se inverteram?

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

description.ar: لقد تجسدت كشخصية في لعبة الحريم العكسية التي كنت ألعبها قبل أن أموت، أصبحت بينولوبي إبنة زوجة الدوق إيكارد.لكن الصعوبة يجب أن تكون الأسوأ فكل ما أفعله سيقودني إلى الموت. فأنا الشخصة الشريرة في قصة هذه اللعبة، لذا يجب أن أنال دعم أحد الشخصيات الذكورية الرئيسية من حريم البطلة قبل ظهور الابنة الحقيقية" لعائلة الدوق شقيقاي الكبيران دائما ما يخوضان قتال معي في كل شيء صغير. و الأمير المتوج المجنون الذي يؤدي طريقه دائمًا إلى موتي. "أنا أرى البطلة فقط ولا أحد آخر ، وكذلك فارسها الرقيق المخلص . "لم أكن أعرف مكاني حتى الآن من الآن فصاعدًا ، سأعيش هادئة مثل الفأر ولن أهتم بشيء لكن لماذا يستمر اهتمامهم بي بالازدياد في كل مرة أرسم فيها الحدود ؟!
description.cs:
Penelope Eckarthová sa prevtelila do adoptívnej dcéry vojvodu Eckartha a záporáčky z reverzného harému. Problém je v tom, že do hry vstúpila na najťažšiu obtiažnosť a nech urobí čokoľvek, v každom závere ju čaká smrť! Skôr než sa objaví "skutočná dcéra" vojvodu Eckartha, musí si vybrať jedného z mužských hrdinov a dosiahnuť šťastný koniec, aby prežila. Dvaja bratia sa s ňou však vždy pohádajú kvôli každej maličkosti, rovnako ako bláznivý korunný princ, ktorého všetky cesty vedú k smrti. Je tu dokonca aj čarodejník, ktorý je do hlavnej hrdinky zamilovaný, a verný otrok rytier! Ale merače priazne hlavných mužských postáv sa akosi zvyšujú, čím viac s nimi prekračuje hranicu! Toto je príbeh o prežití Penelope, ktorá sa ocitla v šialenom reverznom haréme zoznamiek!

---

description.en:
Penelope Eckart reincarnated as the adopted daughter of Duke Eckart and the villainess of a reverse harem dating sim. The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the "real daughter" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! But somehow, the favourability meters of the male leads increase the more she crosses the line with them!

This is Penelope’s survival story, who’s been dropped in an insane reverse harem dating sim!

---

**Official English Translations:** [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9012), [IzePress](https://yenpress.com/series/villains-are-destined-to-die)
*Tappytoon and Pocket are using the Tapas localization.*
description.fr:
Après avoir réussi à fuir son horrible famille, elle pense enfin pouvoir vivre comme elle l’entend. C'est sans compter sur le destin. Tout à coup, la voilà propulsée dans le jeu le plus en vogue du moment. Et elle incarne la méchante de l’histoire, rien que ça! Le problème, c’est qu’elle a déjà fait une multitude de parties en incarnant la vilaine et chacune se concluait par la mort du personnage… Comment va-t-elle pouvoir changer le sort de la diabolique Penelope et éviter le game over?

---

description.id:
Penelope Eckart adalah tokoh antagonis dalam game dating simulation Princess Love Love Project yang akhir-akhir ini terkenal. Di setiap akhir cerita mode normal, tokoh Penelope selalu berakhir dengan kematian di tangan satu dari 5 tokoh pria. Tiba-tiba saja, seorang gadis Korea masuk ke dalam game itu sebagai Penelope Eckart, anak angkat keluarga Duke yang dibenci dan direndahkan semua orang. Dari pengetahuannya di masa lalu, Penelope tahu bahwa ia akan mati dengan mudah jika ia tidak segera mendapatkan hati dari salah satu tokoh pria. Sayangnya, semua tokoh itu adalah orang yang membenci Penelope dan akan membunuhnya jika dia salah langkah. Pilihannya pun terbatas pada Derrick Eckart si kakak angkat yang dingin, Reynold Eckart si kakak angkat yang sering menghina Penelope, Vinter Berdandi si Marquess yang memiliki banyak rahasia, Iklies si budak yang memiliki kemampuan pedang, atau Callisto Regulus si putra mahkota yang menganggap nyawa orang lain sebagai debu. Reputasi Penelope yang buruk dan status di rumahnya sebagai anak angkat yang diabaikan membuat perjalanan hidupnya makin sulit. Mampukan Penelope mengubah pandangan orang terhadapnya dan bertahan hidup?

---

description.it:
Dopo essermi addormentata mentre completavo un gioco attualmente di tendenza, mi sono risvegliata come Penelope Eckhart, la figlia adottiva del Duca Eckhart e malvagia del gioco di simulazione a cui stavo giocando! Il problema è che sono finita nella modalità difficile, e qualunque cosa faccia, a ogni ending mi aspetta la morte! Prima che appaia la "vera figlia" del Duca Eckhart, per riuscire a sopravvivere devo scegliere uno dei protagonisti maschili e raggiungere un lieto fine. Ma i miei due fratelli litigano sempre con me per ogni cosa, così come il folle principe ereditario, a cui tutte le strade portano alla morte. C'è perfino un mago innamorato della protagonista femminile e un leale cavaliere schiavo!

---

description.ja:
私は絶対死なない 何としてでも生き延びてみせる

『何度でも繰り返してやる。死以外のエンディングを迎えるまで…』

友達の勧めではじめた乙女ゲーム、公女様のラブラブ・プロジェクト――。
悪女キャラの『ペネロペ』に感情移入し
ハードモードで死亡エンドを繰り返すも、寝落ち。
そして目覚めると…私がまさかの『ペネロペ』に――!?
1度の選択ミスでも即GAME OVER!
リセット無しのこの世界で、死亡エンドを避けるために奮闘する
ファンタジーコミックス第1巻!!

description.ko:
재벌가의 사생아로 태어나 가족들에게 미움만 받다가 겨우 탈출했는데, 연애 시뮬레이션 게임 속 악역 ‘페넬로페 에카르트’에게 빙의해 버렸다! 진짜 여주인공이 돌아오기 전, 다섯 명의 남자 주인공 중 한 명을 공략하지 못하면… 그녀에게 남은 엔딩은 오직 죽음뿐!

카카오페이지 역하렘 로맨스판타지 웹툰 최다 추천작으로 꼽히는 「악역의 엔딩은 죽음뿐」이 단행본으로 출간되었다. 동명의 인기 소설을 수월 작가의 아름다운 작화로 화려하게 재탄생시킨 작품으로, 연재 시작과 동시에 열렬한 팬덤을 형성하며 나날이 인기를 더해 가고 있다.

---

description.pt:
Eu vou recomeçar até que o destino dessa vilã… Não seja a morte. 

Nascida e criada como filha ilegítima de uma família rica e dona de conglomerado, ela finalmente conseguiu escapar daquela casa infernal, mas então… acabou sendo transportada para um jogo de simulação de relacionamento e virou a vilã, Penelope Eckhart. Se ela falhar em conquistar um dos cinco personagens principais antes da protagonista do jogo retornar, seu destino será apenas a morte! Em um jogo de vida ou morte, quem será o rapaz que Penelope escolherá?

---

description.ru:
Еще вчера я была обычной девушкой, а сегодня... проснулась Пенелопой Экхарт - главной злодейкой в популярной игре "Любовь принцессы". Пенелопу ненавидят, над ней издеваются, и все считают ее ничтожеством. Сводные братья, отец, кронпринц и даже прислуга желают ей лишь одного - смерти. Каждое неверное слово или поступок ведут к гибели. Чтобы выжить, нужно завоевать сердце хотя бы одного из мужчин. Удастся ли злодейке на этот раз обмануть саму смерть?

---
Я перевоплотилась в злодейку, единственную дочь семьи Эккарт. Но самое ужасное — что бы я ни делала, всё приводит меня только к смерти! Я должна сблизиться с кем-то из мужчин гарема героини, прежде чем появится «настоящая дочь» семьи Эккарт!
Два старших брата, которые всегда ссорятся со мной по любому пустяку. Безумный наследный принц, благодаря которому моя жизнь заканчивается смертью.

*По одноимённому роману Квон Гёыль.*

---
Пенелопа Эккарт перевоплотилась в приемную дочь герцога Эккарта и в злодейку из обратного гарема. Проблема в том, что она вступила в игру в самый трудный момент, и независимо от того, что она делает, в конце ее ждет смерть! Прежде чем появится "истинная дочь" герцога Эккарта, она должна стать возлюбленной одного из мужских персонажей и дойти до счастливого финала, чтобы выжить. Но два брата всегда ссорятся с ней из-за каждой мелочи, а также безумный наследный принц, ветка с которым ведет к смерти. Есть даже волшебник, влюбленный в главную героиню, и верный рыцарь-раб! Но, так или иначе, благосклонность мужских персонажей увеличивается еще больше, когда она проводит черту между ними! Это история выживания Пенелопы, которая попала в безумный симулятор свиданий обратного гарема!

---

description.sr: Opsednuta sam ovom igrom! Kao da je zavladala mojim životom… čekaj - AKTIVIRAN TEŠKI REŽIM. Ne-ne-ne-ne-ne! Bukvalno me je uzela i bacila u ulogu Penelope Eckhart. Ljubav je laka kad si heroina, ali kao omraženi negativac, trudim se da ne umrem… od ruke moje braće… princa… viljuške…svaki mogući kraj je smrt! Ovaj svet je naslagan protiv mene, ali mogu li moja pamet i znanje o igrama postići ljubav od ovih muških likova? Ili dugme za resetovanje???
description.tr:
Penelope Eckart; Dük Eckart'ın evlatlık kızı ve harem partner simülatörünün kötü karakteri olarak reenkarne oldum. Sorun şu ki, oyuna en zor seviyede girdi ve ne yaparsa yapsın, her seferinde ölümle burun buruna geliyor! Dük Eckart'ın "gerçek kızı" ortaya çıkmadan önce, erkek ana karakterlerden birini seçmeli ve hayatta kalmak için mutlu bir sona ulaşmalıdır. Ama bu iki kardeş onunla her zaman, en ufak bir şeyde bile kavgaya tutuşuyor. Bununla birlikte rotaları ölüme yol açan çılgın bir veliaht prens, dişi kurşunla büyülenmiş bir sihirbaz ve sadık bir köle şövalyesi bile var! Ama nasıl oluyorsa, ne zaman çizgiyi aşsa ana karakterler ile olan aşk ölçeri yükseklik gösteriyor!

İşte bu çılgın bir harem simülasyonunun içinde tıkalı kalmış Penelope'un hikayesi.

---

description.es-la: Una coreana reencarnó en el cuerpo de Penélope Eckart, la hija adoptiva del Duque Eckart y tambien conocida como la villana de un harén invertido. El problema es que entró al juego en su dificultad más dura, y no importaba lo que haga, ¡la muerte la espera en cada final!

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

altTitles.th: ท่านพ่อไร้เทียมทาน

description.en:
Noh Gajang is a strong, dedicated, and humble man, with much respect for the martial arts. But after the death of his lovely wife, this muscle-for-hire just wants an easy job that allows him to be a good father to his three little babies. He’s even happy to pull guard duty and fend off amateur fighters if it means he can return home safely each night. 

But when a creepy cult starts stealing children from the city, Gajang must step up to the challenge and discover his true warrior potential.

---

description.ko:
하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

* 원작소설 <지천명아비무쌍>

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

description.ru:
История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.en:
Tsukita and Taiyou are close friends at university. One day, Taiyou is revealed to have been stalking Tsukita. However, it turns out Tsukita is also stalking Taiyou, even collecting his baby teeth...
A suspenseful (?) love comedy about two people stalking each other and having 'unrequited' love!

altTitles.es-la: El tiempo de espera del primer amor

description.en: Koji Aiba, who had been living a school life unrelated to girls, suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi, who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world, meets Tokine Shinomiya, a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move, they gradually grow closer and closer, and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.
description.ja: 女子とは無縁の学校生活を送っていた相葉孝司に突如訪れた、１日１時間だけ時が止まる不思議な現象“ロスタイム”。そんな静止した世界の中で、青春を取り戻そうとする孝司は、同じく止まった時の中動くことができる琥珀色の瞳をした少女・篠宮時音と出会う。二人だけしか動かない世界で徐々に距離を縮めていき、やがて時音への想いは初恋へと変わっていく。だが、彼女はその想いを遮るある大きな秘密を抱えているようで——。
description.ru: Айба Кодзи проживал обычную школьную жизнь, не обращая внимания на девушек. Но неожиданно стало происходить странное явление — «потерянное время» — при котором каждый день на один час время останавливало свой ход. Желающий вернуть свою молодость Кодзи встречает молодую девушку, Шиномию Токинэ. Она обладает янтарными глазами, которые помогают ей двигаться под действием «потерянного времени». В мире, где двигаются только два человека, расстояние между ними постепенно уменьшается, и, в конце концов, чувства к Токинэ меняются  ощущения первой любви. Однако у неё есть некий секрет, который мешает её мыслям.
description.es-la: Koji Aiba, que ha llevado una vida escolar ajena a las chicas, recibe de repente la visita de un misterioso fenómeno llamado "Tiempo Perdido", en el que el tiempo se detiene durante una hora al día. Koji intenta recuperar su juventud en un mundo tan inmóvil, y conoce a Tokine Shinomiya, una chica de ojos ámbar que también puede moverse en el tiempo detenido. En un mundo en el que sólo pueden moverse ellos dos, poco a poco se van acercando más y más, y pronto sus sentimientos por Tokine se convierten en su primer amor. Sin embargo, parece que tiene un gran secreto que bloquea sus sentimientos.

description.en: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

In December of 1970 Takemiya published a short story, "In the Sunroom" (in Bessatsu Shojo Komikku) which is possibly the first shonen-ai manga published and contains the earliest known male-male kiss in shōjo manga.  
  
The manga volume consists of five shorter stories:  
  
- Sunroom Nite (In the Sunroom, 1970)  
- Hohoemu Shounen (The Laughing Boy, 1972)  
- 20 no Hiru to Yoru (20 Days and 20 Nights, 1973)  
- Star! (1974)  
- Mister no Kotori (The Mr.'s Baby Bird, 1975) 
  
Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series.html?id=53054)

description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.en: Return of the Unrivaled Spear Knight
Return of the Legendary Spear Knight

altTitles.pt: Retorno do lendário cavaleiro da lança

altTitles.es: El retorno del legendario caballero de la lanza

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของอัศวินผู้ใช้หอกแห่งยุค

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại Của Hiệp Sĩ Giáo

altTitles.es-la: El Regreso del Inigualable Caballero de la Lanza

description.en:
Joshua Sanders, the legendary spearman who ended the brutal civil war, shattered the belief that one must wield a sword to be a master knight.

He fought in the service of his friend, Emperor Caesar van Briton, but it is all for naught when his fearful comrades try to kill him. He’s on the brink of death when his trusty weapon, Lugia, shines and propels him back to the stables of his childhood.

With his mighty spear in hand, Joshua is dead set on revenge in this life!
description.es: El invicto caballero lanza. Una estrella brillante de una casa del Ducado que rompió por completo la lógica común de que un caballero debe usar una espada. El gran héroe que puso fin a la larga guerra civil del imperio. Su nombre era "Joshua Sanders". El hombre conocido como la Lanza Legendaria del Emperador tosía sangre. De las manos de nada menos que su señor, el emperador César... "César, ¡¡no creas que este será el final !!" Mirando a la muerte a la cara con un círculo mágico de explosión frente a él, la lanza "Lukia" que ha estado con él durante décadas comenzó a brillar... Este lugar familiar... ¿Es el establo en el que solía vivir cuando era niño? ¡Incluso me volví más joven! Lukia, ¿qué eres? ¡Joshua ha vuelto a su infancia! ¡Y ahora comienza la historia de su épica venganza!
description.ko:
무패의 창기사.
기사는 검을 써야만 한다는 고정관념을 철저히 깨부순 
공작 가문의 빛나는 별. 제국의 오랜 내전을 일시에 종식시킨 대영웅. 
그 이름은 바로 '조슈아 샌더스'.

황제의 역대 최강의 창이라고도 불리는 그가 명성에 어울리지 않는     
검붉은 피를 울컥거리고 있었다. 다른 누구도 아닌 자신의 주군, 
카이사르 황제의 손에 의해...
"카이사르, 이렇게 끝날 거라 생각하지 마라!!"
폭발 마법진에 의해 죽음을 앞둔 그 순간, 수십 년을 함께 해온 창 
'루기아'가 엄청난 기운을 내뿜기 시작하는데...
낯이 익은 이곳은 설마... 어렸을 때 살던 마구간?
몸도 어려졌잖아?! 루기아 너 대체 정체가 뭐야?

다시 유년시절로 돌아온 조슈아! 그의 사이다 복수극이 시작된다!
description.ru:
Непревзойденный копейщик.

Стереотип о необходимости владения мечом разрушает ярчайшая звезда из герцогской семьи. Герой, что положил конец войне империи, и имя ему - Джошуа Сандерс.

Несмотря на его величие и репутацию, теперь он полумертвый истекает багрового цвета кровью. Ранен он не кем иным, как рукой собственного императора, - Кайзера...

"Кайзер!.. Не мечтай, что всё закончится так легко!!!".

Последние мгновения смерти сопроводили излияния огромного количества энергии от его соратника - копья, что носило имя "Ругия"...

Я... Помолодел?.. Ругия, что ты, черт возьми, такое?!

Джошуа вернул себе молодое тело, и его месть начнется с этого момента!

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door! And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...? A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man!

Note: Adapted from the author’s oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.
description.ja: 引きこもりオタクの吸血鬼・ヒナ。吸血なんて気持ち悪～いことよりも推しを愛でるのが１番！オタ活のためにアニメの聖地に引っ越そう☆と思ったら、推しに超そっくりな男の子が隣に住んでいた!? しかもこの男の子、世界中の吸血鬼を魅了する血を持っているようで…？

altTitles.th: แฟนสาวแค่ 7 วัน

description.en:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"
Sera Fujio is a murderer on the run. He meets Itami Youko, a deli clerk who is a big fan of his personal radio show, “Fujio's Radio”. Their twisted secret escapade begins…

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - A Day of KazuMegu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を! -「100日後に結婚するカズめぐ」

altTitles.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - KazuMegu Will Get Married In 100 days
Kazuma & Megumin Will Get Married in 100 Days

description.en: A parody of ["This Croc Will Die In 100 Days"](https://mangadex.org/title/44625/this-croc-will-die-in-100-days)

title.en: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.en: The Hunter Wants to Live in Peace

description.en: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump—eight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…

altTitles.en: TODAG : Tales of Demons and Gods

description.en:
Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However, he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.  
  
His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life, Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However, with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future), he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.  
  
Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts, and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed, Nie Li fights to protect his lover, friends, family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family," who will abandon their duty and betray the city.
description.ru: Сильнейший в мире заклинатель демонов Не Ли погиб в битве с Мудрецом-Императором. Но его душа воплотилась вновь, вернувшись на десятилетия назад, в нём самом, тринадцатилетнем подростке. Теперь у него есть шанс исправить все ошибки, совершённые в прошлом: спасти от монстров родной город, защитить любимую, друзей и семью. В детстве Не Ли был самым слабым учеником в классе, имея духовную силу на уровне простых людей. Он и мечтать не смел стать воином, не говоря уже о заклинателе демонов, но опыт и знания, накопленные в предыдущей жизни, помогут ему стать сильнее. Ведь сейчас он знает то, что неведомо профессорам в их боевой академии.
description.es-la: Nie Li, el más fuerte Espiritista Demoníaco, en su vida pasada estuvo en la cima del mundo marcial, sin embargo, perdió la vida durante la batalla con el Sabio Emperador y sus bestias, al morir fue devuelto al pasado cuando tenía 13 años gracias a la ayuda del Libro Temporal del Demonio Espiritual y aunque en este momento él es el más débil de su clase con la ayuda de los vastos conocimientos que acumuló de su vida anterior, se transformara en un guerrero formidable.
description.pt-br: Nie Li, o mais poderoso Espiritualista Demoníaco e estando no topo do mundo marcial, perde sua vida durante a batalha com o Imperador Sábio e as seis bestas de nível divino, e sua alma volta ao passado para quando ele tinha 13 anos. Embora ele seja o mais fraco em sua classe, com o talento mais baixo no reino da alma Vermelho – o mais fraco dos reinos – com a ajuda de seu vasto conhecimento acumulado na sua vida passada, cresce mais rápido do que todos. Agora, ele irá tentar proteger a cidade que no futuro será invadida pelas bestas e que acabou sendo destruída, assim como sua amada, seus amigos e sua família que morreram pelo ataque das mesmas, e destruir a família Sagrada que abandonaram seus deveres e traíram a cidade em sua vida passada.

description.en:
He's a vampire destined to lead the world to ruin… So why is he working part time at a convenience store?! A 4-koma about demi-human working!  
  
The new clerk in the convenience store where Amamiya works at is half-human and half-vampire?! Not to mention, their colleagues are a werewolf and an android… Watching these demi-humans work with the half-vampire Kirishima-kun should be entertaining in this working comedy☆

description.en: This is a story about the rescue of a girl who has not slept for many years and who has dark circles under her eyes.
description.ru: Это история о спасении девушки, которая не спала много лет и у которой появились тёмные круги под глазами.

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

description.en:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en: The Sukaku (Zhu He) family is a distinguished line of shamans that protects mankind from divine beasts. Our protagonist, Mutsuki, (Wang Yue) bears a promising future while his sister Uzuki (Chu Yue) completely lacks the capability to use any spiritual techniques. "You are not a child of Sukaku if you are not a shaman." Bound by those antiquated customs, Uzuki is forbidden from leaving the house. As her older brother, Mutsuki is determined to free Uzuki from her confines.

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

description.en: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
description.fr: Un jour, Banaza a été invoqué dans un autre monde, le Royaume magique de Cryroad en tant que candidat Héroïque. Malheureusement, Banaza fût disqualifié des candidats Héroïque car ces statistiques étaient très basique. Alors, le Royaume décida de l'emmener loin du château car il était inutile. Mais alors qu'il se retrouva tout seul, un ennemi apparu devant lui, avec quelques difficultés, il réussit à vaincre l'ennemi, c'est alors qu'il monta de niveau, mais pas tout à fait normalement…
description.ja: 栄えある勇者候補として異世界に召喚された青年バナザは、能力値の低さから勇者失格の烙印を押され国外追放処分となる。なんとか生き延びるべくモンスターを倒すと、レベルが２に上がり彼のステータスが見慣れない「∞」の記号に変わっていた……。突然のステータス変化に戸惑いながらもマイペースに生きていくことを決意するが、魔族の娘フェンリースと運命的な出会いを果たし――!?
description.ru:
Баназа был призван в волшебное королевство Крайроуд в качестве кандидата в герои, но на нём поставили крест, так как тот имел навыки обычного гражданина. Изначально он хотел вернуться в свой мир, но из-за ошибки представителей королевства не смог этого сделать и был вынужден остаться жить в другом мире. Сменив имя на Фурио, он решил жить в своё удовольствие. И вот так, прогуливаясь по новому для себя миру, он победил слизь, получил второй уровень и, взглянув после этого на характеристики, увидел, что все они имеют значение «∞». С этого и начинается его непринуждённая жизнь в другом мире.

---

(source: readmanga)
description.uk: Баназу, звичайного торговця, викликають до іншого світу і нарікають Героєм. Проте увагою він був оточений зовсім недовго - як тільки виявилось, що його здібності не відрізняються від здібностей пересічної людини, бідолаху виставили за двері без можливості повернутись додому. Так і почалось його спокійне життя у зовсім чужому світі, але як тільки він досягнув 2 рівня...
description.vi: Banaza là một thương nhân luôn chăm chỉ làm việc mỗi ngày đã bị đột nhiên triệu hồi tới Vương Quốc Ma Pháp Klyrode xa lạ làm ứng viên dũng sĩ. Tuy nhiên, anh đã bị đánh trượt vì chỉ có cấp độ 1 giống như dân thường. Không những vậy, anh còn không thể trở về vì sai lầm của chính quyền... Banza đã rời vương đô để tới vùng biên cảnh và phải chiến đấu với slime để giữ mạng. Thế rồi, câu chuyện có bước chuyển biến lớn sau khi anh thay đổi hình dáng và tên họ. Một ma thú đã phải lòng anh đi tới hôn nhân. Thế là họ cùng nhau hướng tới một cuộc sống thảnh thơi, không phân biệt chủng tộc!
description.pt-br:
Banaza foi invocado ao reino mágico de Cryroad como candidato a herói. No entanto, por ter especificações como as de uma pessoa comum, ele foi desqualificado e não pôde voltar ao seu mundo devido a um erro das pessoas que o invocaram. Sendo apenas nível 2, Banaza obterá forças além de sua compreensão.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kinojomiya)

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

description.en: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
description.ja: 詳細不明の能力を授けられた少年ハイセ。 彼は幼馴染のサーシャとともに冒険者になるも、能力が扱えず足手まといだとチームから追放されてしまう。 さらに一人冒険者を続ける最中、罠に嵌められて絶体絶命の危機に陥ることに。 死の淵に立たされたその時、ハイセの能力『武器マスター』が目を覚ます！ それは異世界の武器を喚び出すという世界の理をも揺るがす力で！？ 逆境から始まる、異世界無双ファンタジー開幕！

description.en:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.fr:
Enlèvements, meurtres, et relations risquées! Dans les pages scandaleuses de *La fleur abyssale*, la chute de la famille criminelle de Roxana Agrece est déjà annoncée. Ainsi, lorsque Cassis Pedelian, le frère aîné de l'héroïne, est kidnappé par le père de Roxana, elle peut soit attendre la vengeance de l'héroïne... soit prendre les choses en main, puisque Cassis est la clé de sa survie. Mais avec des personnages trompeurs de tous les côtés, Roxana et Cassis peuvent-ils se faire suffisamment confiance pour faire tomber les brutales Agrece?

---

description.id:
Aku tidak sengaja merasuki seseorang dalam novel harem terbalik 19+.  Masalahnya adalah aku menjadi Roxana Agriche, kakak dari sub-penjahat itu. Ayahku menculik saudara pemeran utama wanita itu. Sekarang, apakah satu-satunya hal yang tersisa untuk menemui akhir yang mengerikan dari pembalasan pemeran utama wanita? Tetapi bagaimana jika aku dapat menghindari perkembangan yang mengerikan itu?  “Aku juga tertarik dengan mainan ini.”  "Aku akan melindungimu sampai kamu bisa keluar dari sini dengan selamat."

---
Official Translations:
* [Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Bahasa Inggris / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Bahasa Jepang / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.it:
Accidentalmente mi sono reincarnata in un personaggio in un romanzo di harem inverso per maggiorenni. Il problema è che sono diventata Roxana Agriche, la sorella maggiore del cattivo. Il mio dannato padre ha poi rapito il fratello dell'eroina. Ora cosa ci rimane per incontrare una fine terribile e la vendetta dell'eroina? Ma cosa dovrei fare per evitare quest'orribile sviluppo? "Anche io sono interessata a questo giocattolo." "Ti proteggerò, finché non potrai uscire di qui sano e salvo." Il fratello dell'eroina, Cassis Fedelian, potrà sicuramente ripagarmi più tardi.

---
Official Translations:
* [Giapponese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [Indonesiano / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Inglese / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
description.ja:
どういう訳か小説の中の悪の一族、アグリチェ一家の娘「ロクサナ」に生まれ変わっていた！ アグリチェは人殺しをものともしない残虐非道な一族で、ロクサナもまたその一族の一人。 そして物語は、ロクサナの父「ラント」がある男を拉致してきた場面から始まる。 その拉致されてきた男は、アグリチェ一族とは対極のぺデリアン一族のプリンス「カシス」だった。 アグリチェ一族の誰もがカシスを殺そうとする中、ロクサナだけは唯一家族を騙してでも必死に救おうとする。 最初はロクサナを警戒していたカシスも徐々に心を開き始め…。

description.ko:
어쩌다 보니 19금 역하렘 소설에 빙의했다.

문제는 내가 악역 서브남의 누나가 되었다는 건데... 망할 아버지가 기어이 여자 주인공의 오빠를 납치해 왔다. 이제 여주인공의 가문에 복수 당해 몰락할 일만 남은 건가. 아아, 데드 플래그 피하기 진짜 힘들다.

"이번 장난감에는 저도 흥미가 있어요."

오빠, 이렇게 된 이상 내가 지켜줄게요.

그러니까 이 은혜는 나중에 꼭 갚아요, 알았죠?

description.ru:
Я переродилась в новелле 19+ с реверс-гаремом.

Проблема в том, что я стала старшей сестрой второго, злого главного героя… Мой чертов отец в конце концов похитил старшего брата главной героини. Теперь осталось только дожидаться мести от главной героини и разрушения рода? Ах, избежать смертельной концовки и правда тяжело.

"Я тоже заинтересована в этой игрушке."

Раз уж так вышло, то я тебя защищу. Поэтому обязательно отплати мне той же монетой, понял?

description.tr:
Bir 19+ ters harem romanının içine girdim.

Sorun şu ki, kötü adamın ablası Roxana Agriche oldum. Lanet babam, kahramanın kardeşini kaçırdı. Şimdi, kahramanın intikamından dolayı korkunç bir sonla karşılaşmak geriye kalan tek şey mi?

Ama ya bu korkunç gelişmeden kaçınırsam?

“Buradan sağ salim çıkana kadar seni koruyacağım.”

description.pt-br:
Eu acidentalmente possui alguém em uma novel de harém reverso +19.
O problema é que eu me tornei Roxana Agriche, a irmã mais nova do sub-vilão. Meu maldito pai sequestrou o irmão da heroína.
Agora, a única coisa que me resta é encontrar um final terrível da vingança da heroína?
Mas e se eu puder evitar esse acontecimento?
“Eu também estou interessada nesse brinquedo.”
“Eu vou protegê-lo até que possa sair daqui a salvo.”
O irmão da heroína, Cassis Pedalian, vai definitivamente conseguir me retribuir depois.

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.

This comic reads from left to right.  
  
When Korai was born, she was chosen to be the Cat God’s bride, and now she sees things that only the cat can see.

title.en: I Will Protect My Tyrant Dad!

description.en:
Reborn as a small-town child in a fantasy novel, Sien discovers her father is the exiled heir of a villainous duchy. Fearing their return to the ruthless family, she strives to protect him.  

But wait—her dad was once a tyrant?  

A heartwarming tale of a secretly powerful dad and his scheming daughter trying to preserve his innocence unfolds in this delightful mix of humor and healing misunderstandings.

Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: ドラマティック・アイロニー
ドラマティック·アイロニー

description.en: Can you give me a happy ending? Komatsu Risa is in love with her childhood friend, Sano Chihiro. Although they have a very close relationship, and are often mistaken for a couple, Chihiro is unaware of how Risa feels and accepts a confession from another girl… Heartbroken about her first love, she confides in her seemingly indifferent homeroom teacher, Natsuo.
description.fr:
Risa, élève de 1ère, aime en secret son ami d'enfance Chihiro. Alors le jour où ce dernier lui annonce soudainement qu'il vient de se mettre en couple, Risa tombe des nues. Elle regrette de s'être complue dans cette relation "d'ami d'enfance" et de ne pas lui avoir transmis ses sentiments plus tôt. C'est alors Natsuo, un de ses profs d'apparence pas très sympathique, qui lui remonte le moral. Commence à partir de là une relation ambiguë entre eux. 
Est-ce que Chihiro est vraiment la bonne personne pour Risa ?
